snippet: The struggling Australian surfwear retailer said Friday that TPG Capital has walked away from its $714 million takeover offer-the private equity firm's second bid for Billabong this year-after having "expressed concerns."
abstract: The struggling Australian surfwear retailer said Friday that TPG Capital has walked away from its $714 million takeover offer-the private equity firm's second bid for Billabong this year-after having "expressed concerns."
